products.title: Gibson Jet Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The rich gibson jet black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker pvc fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom.
products.productdescription: The rich gibson jet black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker pvc fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.
